articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Ballistic Rocket's Reentry Environmental Simulation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Ballistic Rocket's Reentry Environmental Simulation
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Scientists and technicians in the defence industry of the DPRK succeeded in the development and local production of heat-resisting materials for rocket with their own efforts and technology after having made diligent researches of years under the direct guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave orders of conducting a test for estimating the heat stability of rocket warhead tip, designed and manufactured with domestic efforts and technology, and the erosion of heat-resistant coating material. And he guided an environmental simulation for reentry by the warhead tip on the spot.
					
					 The simulation was conducted in such way of verifying the thermodynamic structural stability of newly-developed heat-resisting materials through measurement of the erosion degree and internal temperature of the tip under the high pressure and thermal flow caused by aerodynamic heating when a ballistic rocket reenters the atmosphere. The test results met the needs for all the technical parameters.
					
					 The test proved that the tip's thermodynamic structural stability is ensured under the pressure equivalent to actual environmental condition and heat flow about five times stronger than the condition caused at the time of ballistic rocket reentry and, after all, it provided a sure guarantee for the reliability of the inter-continental ballistic rocket warhead reentry.
					
					 Very satisfied over the test results, Kim Jong Un said with high appreciation that the trustworthy scientists, technicians and workers in the munitions industry true to the WPK's revolutionary line of simultaneously developing the two fronts have made long strides in the rocket industry and nuclear technology this year when the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held.
					
					  We have proudly acquired the reentry technology, possessed by a few countries styling themselves as military powers, by dint of self-reliance and self-development, thus making a great progress in the ballistic rocket technology that helps strengthen the independence of the country's defence capability and munitions industry and remarkably enhance the invincible might of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army, he added.
					
					 The level of our advanced strike means, irrefutable in terms of science and technology, just shows the strength and dignity of our country, he said, stressing the need for the munitions industry to rapidly develop the military science and technology and raise higher the level of putting the defence industry on a Juche-based, modern and scientific basis and thus develop and produce more on the highest level diverse and Korean-style military strike means and shells for realizing the Party Central Committee's idea on the military strategy and tactics.
					
					 Declaring that a nuclear warhead explosion test and a test-fire of several kinds of ballistic rockets able to carry nuclear warheads will be conducted in a short time to further enhance the reliance of nuclear attack capability, he instructed the relevant section to make prearrangement for them to the last detail.
					
					 He was accompanied by First Vice Department Director Ri Pyong Chol and Vice Department Director Kim Jong Sik of the WPK Central Committee and General Kim Rak Gyom, commander of the KPA Strategic Force.

articles.title: GFTUK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
GFTUK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) led by Vice-Chairman of its Central Committee Kim Tong Son returned home Tuesday after taking part in the meeting of the Presidential Council of the World Federation of Trade Unions held in Vietnam and visiting Malaysia.

articles.title: Cuban Delegation Leaves for Home
articles.content:
Cuban Delegation Leaves for Home
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Centre of the Cuban Workers headed by General Secretary Ulises Guilarte De Nacimiento left here for home on Tuesday.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba Held
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba took place here on Tuesday. 
					 The meeting was attended by Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission who doubles as chairman of the above-said committee, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, members of the solidarity committee, Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The meeting reviewed last year's work of the committee and discussed this year's action program.

articles.title: Songs Encouraging to Great Feats
articles.content:
Songs Encouraging to Great Feats
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The annals of the Korean revolution have remembered a number of songs inspiring all the people in the DPRK to great feats of heroism.
					 Among them are those reflecting the noble mentality and revolutionary optimism of the Korean women who have always remained faithful to the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 One of them is "Song of Chollima Forerunner" popular during the great Chollima upswing of 1960s through which many ordinary women, including spinner Kil Hwak Sil and agitator Ri Sin Ja, became heroes of the times.
					
					 During the second Chollima upswing of 1990s, the Korean women took active part in making a breakthrough for building a thriving nation, singing the song "Girls Riding on Galloping Steeds".
					
					 Now, the song "Chollima of Songun Korea, Give Full Swing" can be heard from every place where fresh leap forward has been made as part of the ongoing 70-day campaign.

articles.title: New Documentary "Looking back on the Records of Campaigns Led by Our Party" Released
articles.content:
New Documentary "Looking back on the Records of Campaigns Led by Our Party" Released
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- New documentary "Looking back on the Records of Campaigns Led by Our Party" was recently produced in the DPRK.
					 It deals with the 70-day, 100-day, 200-day and 150-day campaigns organized and conducted under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to bring about a turning phase in the socialist construction.
					
					 Recalling with deep emotion the wonderful achievements made during those campaigns for the prosperity of the country, all the servicepersons and people across the country refresh their will to devotedly carry out any tasks set by the WPK.
					
					 The documentary also encourages them to perform great feats in their efforts to greet the 7th WPK Congress with unprecedented achievements through the ongoing 70-day campaign.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Demands S. Korean Side Make Apology and Compensation for Damage Done to Ship of North
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Demands S. Korean Side Make Apology and Compensation for Damage Done to Ship of North 
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- As already reported, south Korean ship Hinee bumped against the north's ship Turubong-3 in the East Sea of Korea in October last year, causing a serious damage and taking to flight.
					 This was deliberate and barbarous gansterism in the sea to dampen the spirit of all service personnel and people of the DPRK mounting on the threshold of the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and invent a pretext for inciting confrontation.
					
					 However, the south Korean side made neither apology nor compensation for the incident.
					
					 Much upset by the DPRK's strong protest and rapidly mounting criticism by the international community, the south Korean puppet authorities made the owner of ship Hinee select a lawyers office and insurance company for the examination of damage in a country and request them to look into the incident.
					
					 The DPRK received an examination delegation and made a detailed field examination with it. As a result, the delegation learned well about how the incident happened and its cause and clearly admitted the damage done to the ship.
					
					 As all data about the incident were objectively confirmed by the third party, the competent organ of the DPRK strongly demanded the south Korean ship owner to pay damages without delay.
					
					 But the ship owner has still refused to pay the damages, without making any apology under the pretext of the prevailing tense situation between the north and the south.
					
					 This is a gangster-like behavior.
					
					 For the south Korean side to evade the due payment of damages under the pretence of the situation on the Korean peninsula, discarding humanitarian commitment, is a hideous human rights abuse as it completely discarded elementary morality and obligation.
					
					 According to international law, when a disaster happens in a sea, every ship is obliged to help distress-torn ship and an assailant is obliged to unconditionally pay indemnities for the damage.
					
					 There can be neither excuse nor pretext in fulfilling the international legal obligation.
					
					 Tension is now escalating in various parts of the world but humanitarian measures are being still taken under the obligations of international law.
					
					 The crime committed by the above-said south Korean ship is obviously an unethical and inhumane one, a wanton breach of the UN Law of the Sea.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the ship owner's impudent behavior clearly suggests who is behind the fabrication of the incident.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean puppet authorities who egged Highny on to deliberately bump against the north's ship in order to bedevil the north-south relations and are instigating him to persistently evade any apology and compensation in contravention of international law.
					
					 This action once again brought to light the true colors of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors who have trumpeted about "humanitarianism" and "human rights" so loudly.
					
					 South Korea is a lawless land as the puppet authorities caused such hideous disaster as the ferry Sewol sinking but took a hands-off approach towards it while pretending ignorance of it.
					
					 It is, indeed, a barren land and tundra of human rights where the people's elementary right to existence is not guaranteed due to the unpopular rule of the Park group of traitors.
					
					 It is the height of hypocritical and double-dealing attitude that the puppet group is fabricating a flurry of evil laws for confrontation such as the "law on human rights in the north" to do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north, pretending ignorance of the reality of the south Korean society.
					
					 It is none other than the group of traitors who is leading the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war by staging the large-scale joint military exercises. It is another unpardonable criminal act against human rights that such arch criminals are using the tense situation as a smokescreen for covering up their unethical and inhumane crime.
					
					 With neither sophism nor lie can the puppet group conceal its despicable true colors as perpetrators of gangsterism in the sea or evade the responsibility for it.
					
					 Its persistent moves to evade the responsibility would only more saliently reveal its true colors as human rights abusers and invite severer punishment.
					
					 The DPRK will resolutely counter any act of impairing its dignity and honor and destroying the product of the precious sweat and blood of its people and force the south Korean side to make an apology and compensation for the damage under any circumstances.

articles.title: Korean-Style Preemptive Counter-Operation Mode Is Just Option for Self-Defense: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Korean-Style Preemptive Counter-Operation Mode Is Just Option for Self-Defense: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Korean-style preemptive counter-operation mode to cope with the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces' moves to ignite a war against the north is a just option for self-defence, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean People's Army (KPA) is filled with the firm will to wipe out huge enemy forces to the last man with the tremendous military muscle and preemptive strike force it has built for years. 
					
					 Various type multiple rocket launchers of the KPA are fully ready to go into action any time, keeping major striking targets in the operation theaters of south Korea within their firing range.
					
					 The KPA Strategic Force conducted a ballistic rocket launching drill under the simulated conditions of exploding nuclear warheads from the preset altitude above targets in the ports under the enemy control where foreign aggressor forces are involved and the "KPA tank crews' competition-2016" was held to demonstrate the will to advance at a breath like storm and lighting over Mt. Paektu, driving over the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces, once an order is issued. This was just a curtain raiser to the resolute countermeasure of the great Paektusan nation which deals ceaseless deadly blows at the warmongers at home and abroad who go reckless, while talking about "landing drill" and "operation to advance into Pyongyang".
					
					 Aggressors will have no chance to set foot on our inviolable territory.
					
					 In case the DPRK starts a powerful preemptive offensive, the U.S. imperialist aggressors and the heinous Park Geun Hye group, the sworn enemies, will meet the most miserable end on the land and in their dens.

articles.title: Prospect of Country Depends on Development of Science and Technology: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Prospect of Country Depends on Development of Science and Technology: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- To develop science and technology is an important matter on which the prospect and destiny of the country hinge at present when the imperialists are getting pronounced in their monopoly of the latest science and technology and blockade moves.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article Tuesday. It goes on:
					
					 Though science and technology should serve for the well-being of mankind, the imperialists are becoming all the more desperate in blockading others to have exclusive possession of science and technology.
					
					 Their ulterior intention is to realize their ambition for domination with ease.
					
					 The present situation teaches a serious lesson that it will not be possible to get freed from domination and plunder by the imperialists nor to bolster the military and economic capabilities nor to protect the sovereignty and interests of the country and the nation unless science and technology are developed.
					
					 Development of science and technology is the way of becoming a power.
					
					 No one offers the latest science and technology.
					
					 To rely on one's own strength and wisdom will only guarantee independent development and prosperity of the country against the imperialists' blockade aimed to monopolize science and technology.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the Workers' Party of Korea to further cement the foundation of socialism and advance it by dint of science.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Labels U.S. Disturber of Global Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Labels U.S. Disturber of Global Peace
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. launched ICBM Minuteman-3 in its mainland. However, what astonished people was that the allied forces of the U.S. kept mum about its missile launch.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. made much fuss, trumpeting about "sanctions" against the DPRK in the van. It, at the same time, test-fired strategic nuclear strike means to disturb global peace and security and kill mankind. It is the height of shamelessness for it to make a mockery of the world people and deceive them.
					
					 The U.S. hostile act of pulling up the DPRK over its satellite launch can never be allowed as it is the brigandish act to make injustice prevail over justice.
					
					 Does Washington have any qualification to talk about peace and security while running amuck to modernize strategic nuclear strike means?
					
					 The U.S. should be denounced as disturber of world peace as it openly launched ICBM in the eyes of the international community.
					
					 It is the contention of the U.S. that it can wield any stick as it pleases but others are obliged to meekly bow to it. This jungle logic will never work on the DPRK.
					
					 Though the U.S. is making much fuss, launching ICBM and flexing its "muscle," the DPRK regards it as nothing but the last-ditch effort of the doomed.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever dynamically advance along the way chosen by itself despite any obstructive maneuvers of the hostile forces.

articles.title: U.S. Is Worst Human Rights Abuser: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Is Worst Human Rights Abuser: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, a civic organization of the U.S. said in an annual report that the ultra-right criminal organizations in the U.S. mainland numbered more than 890 last year.
					 In case of the Ku Klux Klan which earned an ill-fame for advocating extreme racism, it has 190 branches which increased more than two times from 72 branches in 2014.
					
					 Meanwhile, a policeman fired at 16-year-old boy, wounding him in Salt Lake City, Utah State in February. A man made shooting spree against his colleagues, killing three of them and wounding 14 others in Kansas State.
					
					 Minju Joson on Tuesday observes in a commentary in this connection:
					
					 These just a few examples brought to light once again the true colors of the U.S. society, the worst human rights abuser.
					
					 The U.S. has had the human rights abuse as its DNA since its appearance as it rose like a poisonous mushroom from the dead bodies of Indians.
					
					 Such a country is, however, styling itself "a model in human rights performance." It is interfering in the internal affairs of other countries and resorting to high-handed and arbitrary practices, behaving like "a human rights judge" in the international arena.
					
					 This cannot but be another form of human rights abuse.
					
					 No matter what flowery words the U.S. may use to conceal its dunghill, it can never dispose of its foul smell. With no rhetoric can it deny its serious human rights abuses.
					
					 The U.S. is not entitled to take issue with human rights issues of other countries but deserves a stern punishment by the international community for its crimes committed so far.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Recklessly Stage Ssangyong Drills
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Recklessly Stage Ssangyong Drills
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers are getting extremely reckless in their Ssangyong drills simulating the landing on the territory of the DPRK.
					 The war rehearsal is underway in Phohang area, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea.
					
					 On March 12, the war maniacs staged the largest-ever landing operation, which was followed by a drill of "advancing" into the depth of inland tens of kilometers away from where they landed.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean Warmongers' Anti-DPRK War Hysteria under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean Warmongers' Anti-DPRK War Hysteria under Fire 
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A poem of Pak Kum Ran, a south Korean poetess, was posted on the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo on March 7. She denounced the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers for staging military exercises to invade the north.
					 In the poem she said that the roots, stems and seeds which had been in deep slumber in the frozen soil seem to dream when spring comes but the new sprouts telling about the dream are trampled down by tanks and jackboots when the south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises kick off in the season.

articles.title: Suicides on Steady Increase in S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Suicides on Steady Increase in S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- More suicides are occurring in the south Korean puppet army.
					 A sergeant of a forefront unit in Ryonchon County, Kyonggi Province of south Korea committed suicide at his post on March 11.
					
					 On March 9 an officer of the unit was killed by his pistol's bullet while on patrol duty.
					
					 A soldier doused himself with gasoline and set himself on fire in Wonju City of south Korean Kangwon Province on March 11.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Military Rehearsal Slammed Abroad
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Military Rehearsal Slammed Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Han Song Ok, chief of the Information Bureau of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China, made public a statement on March 12 slamming the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet regime for getting hell-bent on the joint military exercises targeting the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet regime, which were left swirling in the wake of the DPRK's first successful H-bomb test and satellite launch, are making desperate efforts. 
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is hell-bent on war exercises against the north by dragging a lot of U.S. nuclear strike groups and special operation forces to south Korea, while spouting such words as "beheading operation" and "toppling of system". It is just the one of traitors who have gone mad in their push to stifle the fellow countrymen in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 The lese majesty to eclipse the sun and the evil act to deprive the Korean people of the base of their living will surely make the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces suffer the worst-ever price.
					
					 The statement urged an immediate halt to their reckless joint military rehearsal.

articles.title: Organization of Koreans in China Demand Retraction of "Law on Human Rights in North"
articles.content:
Organization of Koreans in China Demand Retraction of "Law on Human Rights in North"
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Mudanjiang Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on March 8 urged the south Korean conservative group to retract the "law on human rights in the north" it passed through the "National Assembly."
					 Park Geun Hye who took power by deceiving the south Korean people and the gentries of the "Saenuri Party" are going so shameless as to talk volumes about "human rights issue in the north" in the wake of pushing the inter-Korean relations to the brink of a war in utter disregard of the idea of By Our Nation Itself, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Such human scum is the ignominy of the nation. The south Korean puppet group has no qualifications to get wordy about "human rights."
					
					 It is nonsensical that human rights abusers who are depriving many workers of their job through labor reform and pushing part-time workers and their families into graves are making fuss about "human rights" in the north.
					
					 The statement bitterly denounced the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by the puppet conservative group and the "Saenuri Party".

articles.title: Czech Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Czech Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A Czech preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed
					in Prague on March 9.
					
					 Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give publicity to the revolutionary careers and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and signal successes made by the Korean people under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, and organize colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the meeting.

articles.title: Iranian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Iranian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- An Iranian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed on March 9.
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary careers and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and proud successes made by the Korean people in building an economic giant under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, and organize diverse political and cultural events.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Accused by Beninese, Nigerian Figures
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Accused by Beninese, Nigerian Figures
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Beninese and Nigerian figures issued statements on March 9 in denunciation of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers' largest-ever joint military exercises.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said:
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises are nuclear war drills against the DPRK and hostile acts of infringing upon its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 No military pressure can block the victorious self-development-based advance of the Korean people.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, said:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities, pursuant to their extremely hostile policy toward the DPRK, are staging the largest-ever joint military drills involving huge armed forces for aggression enough to fight a total war despite the DPRK's crucial warning.
					
					 In case a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S. and south Korean authorities' reckless military maneuvers, it is as clear as noonday that it will spill over into a global thermonuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should lend ears to the voices of all Koreans and world peace-loving people aspiring after peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula, and stop the dangerous war rehearsals at once.

articles.title: "Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK Condemned by Syrian Educator
articles.content:
"Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK Condemned by Syrian Educator
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK cooked up by the UN Security Council is the height of hypocrisy and fabrication. 
					 Saber Ballul, department director of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus, said this in a statement on March 7 in denunciation of the unreasonable UNSC's "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers abused the name of the UNSC to fabricate a fresh "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK at last after making much fuss over the latter's justifiable H-bomb test and satellite launch, he recalled, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK's H-bomb test is self-defensive.
					
					 Satellite launch is a sovereign state's legitimate right.
					
					 The DPRK exercised the right only.
					
					 Not only the Syrian people but also world progressive people are strongly denouncing and rejecting the UNSC's "sanctions resolution" wantonly violating the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 I support the DPRK's stand to bolster up its self-defensive nuclear deterrent and continue to exercise its right to use space for peaceful purposes.

articles.title: Swedish Political Party Accuses U.S. and Its Stooges of Stifling DPRK
articles.content:
Swedish Political Party Accuses U.S. and Its Stooges of Stifling DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party in Sweden issued a statement on March 7 criticizing the U.S. imperialists and their stooges' criminal moves for stifling the DPRK.
					 Provocative U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises for invading the DPRK started, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 The UN Security Council's "sanctions resolution" No. 2270 against the DPRK is the extension of the U.S. aggressive hostile policy toward the DPRK and a declaration of war against the sovereignty and vital rights of the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. and its stooges' sanctions and blockade against the DPRK are intolerable.
					
					 No one is entitled to pull up a sovereign state over its satellite launch and bolstering of its self-defensive nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The Communist Party in Sweden strongly denounces the UNSC for encouraging a war on the Korean peninsula by fabricating the criminal "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Urge U.S. to Lift Anti-DPRK Sanctions
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Urge U.S. to Lift Anti-DPRK Sanctions 
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on March 6 in support of the statements made by spokesmen for the government and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons was an inevitable option made by it to cope with the U.S. ever-increasing nuclear threat to it.
					
					 The "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK, a sovereign state, is aimed to bring down its social system, denying its right to existence.
					
					 However, it is a wrong thought that the sanctions can work on the DPRK.
					
					 Nothing can bar the DPRK from emerging as a further developed science powerhouse. This is unequivocal.
					
					 We fully support the statements made by spokesmen for the DPRK government and Foreign Ministry.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Sri Lanka
 Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A Sri Lankan preparatory committee for celebrating the 104th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Colombo on March 10.
					 The chairman of the Gampaha branch of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events such as a seminar on the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for the cause of human independence on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ensayo de ambiente para reentrada de cohete balistico en atmosfera
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ensayo de ambiente para reentrada de cohete balistico en atmosfera
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- Al cabo de incansables investigaciones de varios anos realizadas bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los cientificos y tecnicos de defensa nacional de la RPDC desarrollaron con sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas los materiales de proteccion termica necesarios a la fabricacion de cohetes y los produjeron apoyandose en los recursos nacionales.
					El Mariscal dio la orden de realizar el ensayo para evaluar la seguridad termica de la cabeza de la ojiva del cohete balistico disenada y elaborada con las propias fuerzas y tecnicas y el estado de erosion del material de revestimiento por la proteccion termica, y dirigio sobre el terreno el ensayo del ambiente para la reentrada de la cabeza de ojiva del cohete balistico en la atmosfera.
					
					Este ensayo se realizo a manera de medir la profundidad de erosion y la temperatura interior de la cabeza de ojiva en alta presion y ambiente de corriente termico, que se producen por el calentamiento aerodinamico cuando el cohete balistico reentra en la atmosfera, y confirmar la seguridad de la estructura termodinamica de los inventados materiales de proteccion termica.
					
					El resultado de la prueba dio satisfaccion a todos los indices tecnicos.
					
					En el presente ensayo fue comprobada la seguridad de la estructura termodinamica de la cabeza de ojiva en la condicion de presion similar con el ambiente real y en la corriente termica de casi 5 veces mas fuerte que se crea cuando el cohete balistico reentra en la atmosfera.
					
					El Mariscal mostro gran satisfaccion por el resultado de la prueba y evaluo altamente a los confiables cientificos y tecnicos de defensa nacional y los obreros de faenas belicas quienes aceptando con el corazon la linea revolucionaria de desarrollo paralelo del Partido logran un gran avance en la industria de cohete y la rama de tecnologia nuclear este ano en que se celebra el VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Al poseer dignamente, apoyandose en el espiritu de autofortalecimiento, la tecnologia de reentrada en la atmosfera, poseida por algunos paises autodenominados como potencias militares, fue logrado un gran avance en la tecnologia de cohete balistico, lo cual permite fortalecer la capacidad de defensa nacional y la independencia de la industria belica y elevar extraordinariamente el inquebrantable poderio del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, subrayo.
					
					Apunto que la altura del nivel sofisticado de nuestros medios de golpe irrebatibles en lo cientifico y lo tecnico es precisamente la del poderio nacional y de la dignidad de nuestra patria.
					
					Destaco que la rama de industria belica tiene que desarrollar vertiginosamente las ciencias y tecnicas de defensa nacional y elevar mas el nivel de jucheanizacion, la modernizacion y la fundamentacion cientifica de la industria de guerra para desarrollar y producir mucho mas en nivel supremo diversos medios de golpe militar y los cohetes coreanos que permiten practicar la idea del CC del Partido sobre la estrategia y tacticas militares. 
					
					El Mariscal dijo que a fin de elevar mas la confianza de la capacidad de ataque nuclear realizara dentro de tiempo cercano el ensayo de explosion de ojiva nuclear y el lanzamiento de prueba de los cohetes balisticos de diversos generos con capacidad de cargar ojivas nucleares.
					
					Y dio a la rama correspondiente orden de hacer bien la preparacion previa para el particular.
					
					Le acompanaron Ri Pyong Chol, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Jong Sik, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC y el general de ejercito Kim Rak Gyom, comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion anual de Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion anual de Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en esta capital la reunion anual del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion y del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, So Ho Won, vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, y los miembros del comite solidario.
					
					Asistieron tambien el embajador Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo y otros integrantes de la sede diplomatica cubana en Corea.
					
					La reunion hizo balance del proceso de labor de un ano transcurrido del comite y discutio un plan de actividades del presente ano.

articles.title: Es intolerable la evasion de responsabilidad por pirateria, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Es intolerable la evasion de responsabilidad por pirateria, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- Como es conocido por todos, a principios de octubre del ano pasado, el barco surcoreano HIGHNY choco contra el barco "Turubong-3" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el Mar Este de Corea y se escapo. 
					Es una grave pirateria premeditada para desalentar el elevado animo de los militares y civiles coreanos en visperas del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y preparar el pretexto de enfrentamiento. 
					
					La parte surcoreana no dijo ni una palabra de perdon ni hizo la indemnizacion. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas, aturdidas ante las crecientes protestas y criticas de la RPDC y de la sociedad internacional, instigo al propietario del barco HIGHNY a realizar la investigacion presentando como su encargado pericial a una oficina juridica y una compania limitada de seguro pericial de un pais.
					
					La RPDC acepto la delegacion de peritacion y realizo concretamente el peritaje en el terreno para aclarar el motivo y la causa del incidente y las perdidas. 
					
					Dado que se ha confirmado objetivamente la verdad del caso,  el organo correspondiente de la RPDC demando fuertemente al propietario del barco surcoreano a pagar de inmediato la indemnizacion merecida. 
					
					Pero, el lo elude pretextando la situacion empeorada entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					Es una actitud gangsteril y crimen de lesa humanidad. 
					
					Segun la ley internacional, se debe ayudar mutuamente en el caso de surgir una calamidad en el mar y el danador debe indemnizar incondicionalmente.
					
					No hay ningun pretexto y razon en la ejecucion del deber internacional. 
					
					Hoy dia, por doquier del mundo ocurren los conflictos que agravan la tension, pero, se ponen en practica las medidas humanitarias en virtud de la ley internacional. 
					
					La pirateria cometida por el barco surcoreano HIGHNY es un crimen antietico y antihumanitario que infringe la ley maritima de la ONU. 
					
					Entonces, el proceder cinico del propietario del barco insinua quien es el controlador trasero del presente caso. 
					
					A instigacion de las autoridades surcoreanas, cometio esta provocacion premeditada a fin de empeorar las relaciones intercoreanas y elude la disculpa y la indemnizacion a contrapelo de la ley internacional. 
					
					De esta manera, se ha evidenciado de nuevo la naturaleza de lesa humanidad de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye que preconiza tanto el "humanitarismo" y los "derechos humanos". 
					
					En la sociedad surcoreana las autoridades no toman ningunas medidas aun despues de causar la tragedia del ferry "Sewol". 
					
					Como vemos, el Sur de Corea es el infierno de DDHH que no asegura a la poblacion ni el derecho elemental a la subsistencia debido a las politicas antipopulares de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye. 
					
					Despreciando esta realidad, los titeres surcoreanos inventan a sus caprichos las infames leyes contra la parte connacional como la "ley de DDHH del Norte", lo cual es el climax de la hipocresia y versatilidad. 
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos llevan al borde de la guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana librando junto con EE.UU. los ejercicios belicos conjuntos de gran envergadura y los utilizan como un escudo para ocultar sus crimenes antietico y antihumanitario. 
					
					Pero, no pueden ocultar con ninguna sofisteria e intrigas su naturaleza asquerosa como piratas ni eludir la culpabilidad.
					
					Por mas que se desesperen por evitar la responsabilidad por su pirateria, pondran mas al desnudo sus huellas criminales ante la sociedad internacional y recibiran el castigo mas duro.
					
					La RPDC hara frente rotundo a todos los crimenes tendentes a manchar la dignidad y el honor de si misma y destruir las creaciones preparadas a precio de su sangre y sudor y cobrara sin falta la disculpa y la indemnizacion merecida.
